long_description: The ENO Possum Hammock Pocket is a sleek pack designed to hold your hammock, straps and a few other small essentials while you stroll to the festival or your favorite campsite. The vertical zipper allows easy access to the inside; external slash pocket gives you a place to stash small items. When it's time to kick back in your hammock, the Possum Pocket hangs from the end of your hammock. Adjustable shoulder strap makes it easy to sling the bag over your shoulder. Ripstop nylon resists abrasion. The ENO Possum Hammock Pocket has a gear capacity of 320 cu. in. (5.25 liters).
short_description: The ENO Possum Hammock Pocket is a sleek pack designed to hold your hammock, straps and a few other small essentials while you stroll to the festival or your favorite campsite.
